title: Upgrading
intro: If you wish to upgrade to FieldLogs Enterprise the process is easy to start. Simply follow the instructions in this section.

points.text: Navigate to the Settings page by clicking the gear icon in the top bar
Fill in your details and submit the form
The staff at FieldLogs will be in contact with you personally to set up your custom Enterprise structure

blocks.content: We are following this procedure while we are in Closed Preview of our Enterprise features. In the future we will automate and make this step much quicker & easier for our users
